title: Bottle (crafting station)
summaries: The Placed Bottle functions as a crafting station for potions.

Any of the following will function as this crafting station, as long as they are placed on a flat item of <linked>furniture</linked> – any <linked>Platform</linked>/<linked>Planter Box</linked>, <linked>Table</linked>, <linked>Dresser</linked>, <linked>Work Bench</linked>, <linked>Bookcase</linked>, <linked>Piano</linked>, <linked>Fireplace</linked>, or the <linked>Tinkerer's Workshop</linked>.

The Alchemy Table(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) from the Dungeon also crafts potions, but has improved functionality as it also offers a 1/3 (33.33%) chance of not consuming a particular crafting ingredient.
